question:
Last Wednesday you flew from London to Vancouver. When you arrived home, you dsicovered that you had left your hand luggage on the plane.

Write a letter to the airline. In your letter, you should explain:

Where and when you lost your bag
What your bag looks like
What its contents were
text: My name is Justine Zanini, and I am writing to report my lost luggage on plane A45, which occurred on Wednesday, 12th of April 2022. I flew from London to Vancouver. I noticed my hand baggage missing when I arrived home later that day.

My luggage is a Liu Jo black and white with a pink strap around it. It is quite big, probably around 80 cm by 70 cm. I am pretty sure I forgot it next to my seat 18K because I was in a hurry to get home as I had a very important online meeting to attend.

As you can imagine, this item is very valuable to me. Hence, I would be very grateful if you could help me find it. Please don't hesitate to contact me by email at [email protected] or with a call at .550505055 if you have any clue.
